summary: Adds a pet to several houses in Skyrim and spell tomes to summon the pets anywhere. The summons last 5 minutes.
descriptionHtml:
COPIED FROM STEAM WORKSHOP:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10118

Adds a pet to several houses in Skyrim and spell tomes to summon the pets anywhere. The summons last 5 minutes.

---Current Pets---
1. Martin - Mudcrab - Whiterun
2. Eggman - Horker - Windhelm
3. Howard - Dwarven Sphere - Markarth
4. Simon - Ice Wraith - Arch-Mage Tower

Each pet has a unique story written inside their spell tome. You can read these in the Creation Kit, but I'm unsure if there is a way to read them in the game.

I would prefer comments be given on the Steam Workshop as I am more likely to see those.
author: Batophobia
